item.immersive_aircraft.bomb_bay.descrip: Drops TNT, don’t destroy blocks but deals heavy damage, yarrr!
item.immersive_aircraft.telescope.descri: A bulkier version o' the spyglass.
item.immersive_aircraft.heavy_crossbow.d: A heavy crossbow with a powerful punch, be requirin' arrows.
item.immersive_aircraft.airship.descript: Airships may not be the fastest vehicle, but they sure are easy to maneuver.
item.immersive_aircraft.cargo_airship.de: Slow and fuel hungry but carries an entire storage.
item.immersive_aircraft.warship.descript: A flyin' fortress, slow but heavily armed.
item.immersive_aircraft.biplane.descript: This trusty, rustic biplane will take ye anywhere fast and rather reliably. Make sure yer runway be long enough.
item.immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne.descrip: Who needs an engine if one could power the aircraft with pure brawn? Give it a good push and off it flies!
item.immersive_aircraft.quadrocopter.des: A masterwork of engineering! 4 rotors strapped to some bamboo. Perfect for building, and that's about it.
item.immersive_aircraft.bamboo_hopper.de: A hefty craft with three seats an' pontoons t' land safely on water.
immersive_aircraft.gyrodyne_target_reach: Minimum rotor speed reached, ready fer takeoff!
immersive_aircraft.invalid_dimension: This craft don’t work in this here dimension.
immersive_aircraft.tried_dismount: Press again to jump out, yarrr!
immersive_aircraft.fat.out: Ye be too hungry t' fly!
option.immersive_aircraft.separateCamera: Use a separate camera in aircraft.
option.immersive_aircraft.useThirdPerson: Defaults t' third person camera in aircraft.
option.immersive_aircraft.useCustomKeybi: Use multi-keybindings, may break certain mods.
option.immersive_aircraft.showHotbarEngi: Render the engine gauge over the hotbar, aye!
option.immersive_aircraft.crashDamage: Damage the scallywag on a crash.
option.immersive_aircraft.preventKillThr: Will not send the scallywag to Davy Jones on a crash.
option.immersive_aircraft.healthBarRow: Offset the health bar of vessels.
option.immersive_aircraft.damagePerHealt: Higher values make the craft more durable, aye!
option.immersive_aircraft.weaponsAreDest: Allow some cannons t' destroy blocks.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropInventory: Drop yer booty, instead o' keepin' it within the aircraft item.
option.immersive_aircraft.dropUpgrades: Drop the upgrades an' customization, instead o' keepin' it within the aircraft item.
option.immersive_aircraft.regenerateHeal: Automatically regenerates health e'ery tick, simulating vanilla behavior, aye.
option.immersive_aircraft.requireShiftFo: Only repair when holdin' shift, otherwise just enter the vessel.
immersive_aircraft.tooltip.no_target: Needs t' be assembled on the deck!
